DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety intraocular pressure ( IOP ) -lowering efficacy change DuoTrav® prior timolol 0.5 % monotherapy participant open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Changing DuoTrav Patients Uncontrolled Timolol
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis ocular hypertension , primary openangle glaucoma pigmentary glaucoma ; Intraocular pressure ( IOP ) 19 35 mmHg time day least one eye ( designate study eye ) ; On stable medication regimen IOP reduction one week prior screen visit ; Best correct visual acuity well 20/200 ( Snellen ) 1.0 ( logMAR ) eye ; Sign inform consent ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Known medical history allergy , hypersensitivity low tolerance component DuoTrav® ; Any abnormality would preclude reliable performance applanation tonometry either eye ; Infection either eye ; Conventional laser intraocular surgery either eye 3 month prior screen visit ; Risk visual field visual acuity worsening , opinion investigator ; Women childbearing potential ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Any condition , opinion principal investigator , could interfere participation study , could present risk participant . Participation another clinical study within 30 day screen visit ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
